column4: hi @ all, can some1 help me with my firefox? it doesn't start when i run the command....
i am using firefox %u (i click the icon^^) .... but when i rename the .mozilla-folder it works
the problem is that i don't wanna install all the plugins, bookmarks, add-ons and passwords again.....
If you backed it all up just restore it. Other than that you will have to install plugins / add-ons.
can i also backup the plugins/passwords?
cause i played a long time that flash works and i don't wanna do this again^^
Flash is so easy to install... I am not completely understanding the problem, someone else will step in :)
do u have a x86 or a x64 ubuntu?
good, can u plz say me which is the best flash-plugin here? there are 3 and i don't know the best of them :)
Give me one sec to get you the download link :)
The download link is at the bottom, save the file to the desktop, right click the file and choose extract here, place libflashplayer.so into the ~/.mozilla/plugins folder
nice, thxal, now i can delet the .mozilla-directory and reinstall all things :)
